text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Who are you~?
Where are you~?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... that's strange.
I thought I heard someone calling, 'Come here~'.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Do you know who called me?
